embeds.title: ❗️ Action Required for `${CI_COMMIT_REF_NAME}` ❗️
embeds.description: [${CI_PROJECT_NAME}](${CI_PROJECT_URL}): Pipeline [#${CI_PIPELINE_ID}](${CI_PROJECT_URL}/-/pipelines/${CI_PIPELINE_ID}) of branch [${CI_COMMIT_REF_NAME}](${CI_PROJECT_URL}/-/commits/${CI_COMMIT_REF_NAME}) by ${GITLAB_USER_NAME} (${GITLAB_USER_LOGIN}) is ready to publish manually as [${NEW_BRANCH}](${PUBLIC_REPO_URL}/tree/${NEW_BRANCH})
